hypothesis_content.title: Meme Coin (PEPE, DOGE) Extreme Fade After +25% Pump
hypothesis_content.statement: For meme coins (PEPE, DOGE), a single-day price pump of +25% or more on elevated volume (≥200% of 20-day avg) during a NEUTRAL regime will be followed by a mean reversion drop of -8% to -15% over the next 2-3 days as speculative froth deflates.
hypothesis_content.rationale: Meme coins in neutral markets lack sustained buy-side momentum. Extreme one-day pumps are often driven by retail FOMO and get sold into by early buyers and market makers, leading to quick reversion.
entry_conditions: No major ecosystem/news catalyst (e.g., Elon tweet, exchange listing) in past 24h

exit_conditions.take_profit: -10% from next day's open price (short position)

hypothesis_content.falsification_criteria: Median 3-day return after pump is positive OR price continues rising >50% of instances, indicating sustained momentum instead of reversion.
